arts.ttl: Hurzeler has stated that Brighton ‘need to take it serious’ against Barnsley
arts.sum: They have good individual players that they have a good style of play and therefore we need to prepare well and um yeah it's our responsibility to take it serious to not underestimate one opponent and that's what we try to do.” They are an opponent whom Hurzeler has respect for, especially after the exit of Man United against Grimsby Town in the last round reminded people what happens when the top teams tail off.

arts.ttl: Barnsley vs Brighton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Premier League side Brighton & Hove Albion travel to Oakwell on Tuesday for a third-round Carabao Cup tie against League One outfit Barnsley. Both teams will be looking to bounce back from disappointing weekend results, with Brighton in particular hoping to end a long-standing poor record in this competition. arts.ttl: Brighton XI vs Barnsley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton travel to Barnsley on Tuesday, aiming to put a frustrating weekend behind them and begin a meaningful Carabao Cup run. After throwing away a two-goal lead in the dying moments against Tottenham on Saturday, a convincing performance against League One opposition is needed to restore confidence and momentum.
